# Ioun Torch
## Overview
**Aura** strong universal; **CL** 12th

**Slot** —

**Price** 75 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This item is merely a burned out, dull gray *ioun stone* with a *[[Continual Flame (Spell)|continual flame]]* spell cast upon it. It retains the ability to float and orbit, and allows the bearer to carry light and still have his hands free. It may be in any crystalline shape common to *ioun stones* (ellipsoid, prism, sphere, and so on).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Continual Flame (Spell)|continual flame]]*, creator must be 12th level

**Cost** 62 gp, 5 sp

**Source:** Ultimate Equipment, pg. 305
